short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for medical billing professionals that identifies key words and recommends appropriate coding

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eighth Element uses our proprietary AI-powered algorithm to help medical professionals identify keywords and make smart billing code recommendations in order to save time, cuts costs, reduce risks and optimize medical billing practices.

Monthly or Annual Licenses can be purchased at https://8thelement.io/shop/

Chrome plugin is easy to install, and simple to use. Start by copy+pasting text into the form field, or using the voice dictation tool to convert voice to text. Some users will convert entire sessions in order to copy and paste back into patient record, thus removing the need to pay for other voice dictation tools.

Once text is entered and scanned, 8th Element will use AI to identify keywords and recommend corresponding CPT and ICD (medical billing) codes. These codes are simple to copy and paste back into patient records, thus ensuring complete, accurate and optimized billing charts for doctors, clinics and hospitals.

Support is simple and available anytime via a beacon on the plugin that allows contact with 8thElement, as well as access to a knowledge base with FAQs and best practices.

Aside from scanning your text inputs, 8th Element also offers deeper Search functionality to find codes and macros for any term you enter. You can also choose to enter multiple codes into NCCI edits which confirms whether certain codes can or should be used in conjunction with one another.

Since the 8th Element software is a Chrome plugin, it is agnostic and works with any EHR or EMR chart, record or system. 

8th Element is HIPAA certified and operates in compliance with all best practices with handling of sensitive data. The only data tracked is with regard to usage and traffic, NOT personal or sensitive data. Full privacy policy can be found here - https://8thelement.io/privacy-policy/

We hope you enjoy our plugin!
